message_food: Four options available, each day you can choose a different dish according to your taste and preference. Flexibility and flavor combine in our selection!
swipe_sideways_to_see_available_options: Swipe sideways to see available options
select_the_days_you_will_want_this_meal: Select the days you will want this meal
choose_the_food_you_like_the_most_from_o: Choose the food you like the most from our options.
you_can_select_the_days_on_which_you_wan: you can select the days on which you want that menu
you_can_click_on_the_cart_after_paying_y: You can click on the cart, after paying you will receive a QR in your email which you must present on the day of the event.
